name: Through the Seasons
description:
"Let every seasons be with you."

Through the Seasons is a 2D casual endless runner game with a theme of seasons. You are a traveler in a colorful changing world. Run until you're tired and rest for a while before starting your journey again.

Features

  • Ever-changing world based on seasonal themes
  • More than 20 achievements are waiting to challenge you
  • An orange-hair child!

How To Play

  • [Z] - Jump
  • [X] - Slide
